section.name: Getting Started with Java AIM Bot
section.p: This document (as well as the others in this section) provide an introduction to how to setup and use Java AIM Bot.

subsection.name: Overview of the Getting Started Documentation

tr.td: Before you can start using Java AIM Bot, you'll have to download the distribution. This document provides links to the various distributions available.
This document provides information about how to configure the various properties of Java AIM Bot.
This document provides information on how to run your own bot.
